entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 4:44 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
